tns:patch.author: Mistre Wgiorgis
tns:patch.description: Modify Audit Logger Cleanup global setting possible values

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_audit_trial_cleanup AS SELECT u.value_id AS id, u.value_shown AS value FROM util_global_settings_possible_ u WHERE ((u.setting_name)::text = 'Automatic Audit Logger Cleanup'::text) ORDER BY u.id;
